short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds the ability to like/dislike and comment on any page on the internet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bringing the dislike button back, but this time EVERYWHERE.

Like/Dislike/Comment on any page on the web. Freely discuss through the sidebar on any webpage, whether it's a YouTube video, a Wikipedia page, a classroom page, and any of your favorite websites. Voterr aims to bring back free speech to the internet. 


FEATURES
____________________________________________________________________________
- Comment anywhere, on any page.
- Like any link, let people know if a site is good.
- Dislike any link. Website gave you a bad recipe? Dislike it.
- Keep comments centralized rather than having to look through 20 different social media platforms.
- Go to the homepage of voterr.io to view the top links of the day.
- Anything that has a permalink on the internet can be used. Netflix shows, classroom pages, social media profiles.



NOTICE
____________________________________________________________________________
Voterr.io does NOT sell any of your private or personal data to anybody. I do NOT monitor your browsing history donâ€™t worry.
